text:
Zeus (YC S11) | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | VISA - Yes | https://zeusliving.com

We’re modernizing the $12B corporate housing industry at Zeus and on a mission to be the most trusted housing company in the world. We partner with homeowners to transform their homes into desirable destinations for business travelers. By leasing unfurnished, privately-owned homes and converting them into expertly appointed, full-service corporate housing units for today’s global professional, we give residents a quality home to stay in for months at a time.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/zeus

Our open positions:

* Full-Stack Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/39f29ee7-3f73-424a-82e0-1dacdeb1f...

* Front-End Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/1583eb43-8c90-4b45-9feb-cf3a1e437...

* Data Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/fbcc681d-1eaf-46a5-aead-c8bf15859...

* Product Designer: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/b0edcfcc-624b-4591-8faa-1fa6a9548...

* Product Manager: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/12458855-7372-4593-9566-cbe4d6333...

* Head of Design: https://jobs.lever.co/zeus/f74a7c0e-d646-43f3-b91a-22e57e692...

Tech Stack: React / jQuery Ruby on Rails PostgreSQL AWS

Apply on our Lever site or email joe+hackernews@zeusliving.com if interested.
